column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We dined at Bavettes a couple months ago and had a spectacular experience. On the first trip there
column2: it was last minute so we couldn't get a reservation other than at 9:15 pm
column3: but the server was very attentive
column4: food was phenomenal and the experience/ambiance couldn't be beat. We raved about Bavettes to all our friends
column5: and told everyone that the 22oz dry aged prime ribeye was possibly the best steak in chicago (as I mentioned in my previous review).
